trans-unit.source: Represents a plug-in that can be added to a control's <see cref="P:System.Windows.UIElement.StylusPlugIns" /> property.
The <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn> allows you to manipulate <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> objects on separate threads.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn>可讓您操作<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>個別執行緒上的物件。

trans-unit.source: Separate threads are used so that the ink still renders as the tablet pen inputs data even if the application is doing something else.
trans-unit.target: 會使用個別執行緒，以便筆跡仍然會轉譯成 tablet 畫筆輸入資料即使應用程式所執行的其他動作。

trans-unit.source: To intercept stylus points from the hardware, create a class that inherits from the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn> class.
trans-unit.target: 若要攔截手寫筆的點，從硬體，建立繼承自類別<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn>類別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn> class has the following methods that you can override to manipulate <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint> objects on a thread in the pen thread pool.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn>類別具有下列方法，您可以覆寫來操作<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint>畫筆中的執行緒上物件的執行緒集區。

trans-unit.source: The pen's input is routed to an element's <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn> on the pen thread.
trans-unit.target: 畫筆輸入路由傳送至的項目<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn>畫筆執行緒上。

trans-unit.source: Since accurate hit-testing cannot be performed on the pen thread, some elements might occasionally receive stylus input intended for other elements.
trans-unit.target: 無法在畫筆的執行緒上執行精確的點擊測試，因為某些項目可能有時會接收其他項目的手寫筆輸入。

trans-unit.source: If you need to make sure the input was routed correctly before performing an operation, subscribe to and perform the operation in the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusDownProcessed%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusMoveProcessed%2A>, or <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusUpProcessed%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果您需要確定輸入執行作業之前已正確傳遞，訂閱，並執行中的作業<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusDownProcessed%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusMoveProcessed%2A>，或<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusUpProcessed%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: These methods are invoked by the main application thread after accurate hit-testing has been performed.
trans-unit.target: 執行精確的點擊測試之後，這些方法會叫用由主應用程式執行緒。

trans-unit.source: To subscribe to these methods, call the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.RawStylusInput.NotifyWhenProcessed%2A> method in the method that occurs on the pen thread.
trans-unit.target: 若要訂閱這些方法，請呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.RawStylusInput.NotifyWhenProcessed%2A>發生於畫筆執行緒的方法中的方法。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you call <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.RawStylusInput.NotifyWhenProcessed%2A> in <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusMove%2A>, the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusMoveProcessed%2A> occurs.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.RawStylusInput.NotifyWhenProcessed%2A>中<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusMove%2A>、 <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusMoveProcessed%2A> ，就會發生。

trans-unit.source: If you use a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn> inside a control, you should test the plug-in and control extensively to make sure they do not throw any unintended exceptions.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn>在控制項內，您應該測試外掛程式，並控制廣泛以確定它們不會擲回任何非預期的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: XAML Text Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML 文字用法

trans-unit.source: This class is not typically used in XAML.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別通常不是在 XAML 中使用。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a custom <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn> that constrains the ink to a certain area on the control.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立自訂<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn>，限制要在控制項上的某個區域的筆墨。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn" /> class.
Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> to which the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn" /> is attached.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> to which the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn" /> is attached.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" />的<see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn" />附加。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.Element%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn> when it is added to the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.StylusPlugIns%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例所示<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.Element%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn>時加入至<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.StylusPlugIns%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets the cached bounds of the element.
The cached bounds of the element.
trans-unit.target: 項目的快取的範圍。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn> caches the bounds of its element to perform hit testing.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn>快取以執行其元素的邊界點擊測試。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.DynamicRenderer>, which inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn>, uses an <xref:System.Windows.Media.ImageBrush> to render a stroke.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.DynamicRenderer>，後者繼承自<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn>，會使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.ImageBrush>呈現筆觸。

trans-unit.source: This brush partially draws the image file specified by `imageFile`.
trans-unit.target: 這個筆刷部分繪製所指定的映像檔案`imageFile`。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn" /> is active.
<see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn" /> is active; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 如果<see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn" />作用中; 否則<see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: XAML Text Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML 文字用法

trans-unit.source: This property is not typically used in XAML.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性通常不是在 XAML 中使用。

trans-unit.source: The following example checks the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.Enabled%2A> property in the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnEnabledChanged%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會檢查值<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.Enabled%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnEnabledChanged%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn" /> is able to accept input.
<see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn" /> is able to accept input; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 如果<see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn" />能夠接受輸入; 否則為<see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The following conditions must be met for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn> to accept input:
trans-unit.target: 必須符合下列條件<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn>接受輸入：

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn> is a member of a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugInCollection>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn>隸屬<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugInCollection>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.Element%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn> is visible and enabled.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.Element%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn>顯示並啟用。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to override the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnIsActiveForInputChanged%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何覆寫<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnIsActiveForInputChanged%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn" /> is added to an element.

The following example shows the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.Element%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn> when it is added to the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.StylusPlugIns%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例所示<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.Element%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn>時加入至<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.StylusPlugIns%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.Enabled" /> property changes.

The following example checks the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.Enabled%2A> property in the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnEnabledChanged%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會檢查值<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.Enabled%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnEnabledChanged%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.IsActiveForInput" /> property changes.

Use the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnIsActiveForInputChanged%2A> method to allocate and clean up resources used by the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnIsActiveForInputChanged%2A>方法來配置並清除所使用的資源<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn>。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to override the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnIsActiveForInputChanged%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何覆寫<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnIsActiveForInputChanged%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn" /> is removed from an element.
A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.RawStylusInput" /> that contains information about input from the pen.
Occurs on a thread in the pen thread pool when the tablet pen touches the digitizer.
This method occurs on a pen thread, so minimize work in this method to avoid impacting performance.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法，就會發生在畫筆執行緒，因此最小化中這個方法，以避免影響效能的工作。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to override the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusDown%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何覆寫<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusDown%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To create a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn> that restricts ink to a certain area, see the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn> overview.
trans-unit.target: 若要建立<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn>可限制到特定區域的筆墨，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn>概觀。

trans-unit.source: The object that the application passed to the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.RawStylusInput.NotifyWhenProcessed(System.Object)" /> method.
<see langword="true" /> if the pen's input was correctly routed to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
Occurs on the application UI (user interface) thread when the tablet pen touches the digitizer.
To subscribe to this method, call <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.RawStylusInput.NotifyWhenProcessed%2A> in the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusDown%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要訂閱這個方法，請呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.RawStylusInput.NotifyWhenProcessed%2A>中<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusDown%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn> that checks for the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture.Down> gesture.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn>，以檢查<xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture.Down>筆勢。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn> calls <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.RawStylusInput.NotifyWhenProcessed%2A> in <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusUp%2A> to subscribe to the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusUpProcessed%2A> method, which is called from the application UI thread.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn>呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.RawStylusInput.NotifyWhenProcessed%2A>中<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusUp%2A>訂閱<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusUpProcessed%2A>方法，從應用程式 UI 執行緒呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The relationship between <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusDown%2A> and on <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusDownProcessed%2A> is identical.
trans-unit.target: 之間的關聯性<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusDown%2A>以及<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusDownProcessed%2A>完全相同。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.RawStylusInput" /> that contains information about input from the pen.
<see langword="true" /> if the pen actually entered the bounds of the element; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
Occurs on a pen thread when the cursor enters the bounds of an element.
This method occurs on a pen thread, so minimize work in this method to avoid impacting performance.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法，就會發生在畫筆執行緒，因此最小化中這個方法，以避免影響效能的工作。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.RawStylusInput" /> that contains information about input from the pen.
<see langword="true" /> if the pen actually left the bounds of the element; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
Occurs on a pen thread when the cursor leaves the bounds of an element.
This method occurs on a pen thread, so minimize work in this method to avoid impacting performance.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法，就會發生在畫筆執行緒，因此最小化中這個方法，以避免影響效能的工作。

trans-unit.source: The following example resets the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn> when the cursor leaves the bounds of the element.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會重設<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn>當游標離開元素的邊界。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.RawStylusInput" /> that contains information about input from the pen.
Occurs on a pen thread when the tablet pen moves on the digitizer.
This method occurs on a pen thread, so minimize work in this method to avoid impacting performance.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法，就會發生在畫筆執行緒，因此最小化中這個方法，以避免影響效能的工作。

trans-unit.target: 若要建立<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn>可限制到特定區域的筆墨，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn>概觀。

trans-unit.source: The object that the application passed to the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.RawStylusInput.NotifyWhenProcessed(System.Object)" /> method.
<see langword="true" /> if the pen's input was correctly routed to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
Occurs on the application UI (user interface) thread when the tablet pen moves on the digitizer.
To subscribe to this method, call <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.RawStylusInput.NotifyWhenProcessed%2A> in the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusMove%2A> method
trans-unit.target: 若要訂閱這個方法，請呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.RawStylusInput.NotifyWhenProcessed%2A>中<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusMove%2A>方法

trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn>，以檢查<xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture.Down>筆勢。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn> calls <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.RawStylusInput.NotifyWhenProcessed%2A> in <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusUp%2A> to subscribe to the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusUpProcessed%2A> method, which is called from the application UI thread.

trans-unit.source: The relationship between <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusMove%2A> and on <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusMoveProcessed%2A> is identical.
trans-unit.target: 之間的關聯性<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusMove%2A>以及<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusMoveProcessed%2A>完全相同。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.RawStylusInput" /> that contains information about input from the pen.
Occurs on a pen thread when the user lifts the tablet pen from the digitizer.
This method occurs on a pen thread, so minimize work in this method to avoid impacting performance.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法，就會發生在畫筆執行緒，因此最小化中這個方法，以避免影響效能的工作。

trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何覆寫<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusUp%2A>方法。

trans-unit.target: 若要建立<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn>可限制到特定區域的筆墨，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn>概觀。

trans-unit.source: The object that the application passed to the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.RawStylusInput.NotifyWhenProcessed(System.Object)" /> method.
<see langword="true" /> if the pen's input was correctly routed to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
Occurs on the application UI (user interface) thread when the user lifts the tablet pen from the digitizer.
To subscribe to this method, call <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.RawStylusInput.NotifyWhenProcessed%2A> in the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusUp%2A> method
trans-unit.target: 若要訂閱這個方法，請呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.RawStylusInput.NotifyWhenProcessed%2A>中<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusUp%2A>方法

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn> that checks for the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture.Down> gesture.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn>，以檢查<xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture.Down>筆勢。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn> checks for the gesture in the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusUpProcessed%2A> method, which is called from the application UI thread.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn>會檢查是否有在軌跡<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusUpProcessed%2A>方法，從應用程式 UI 執行緒呼叫。
